name: HARD GAME EXE
description:
This masterpiece was made in 2 days. I am so happy to represent you the HardGameExe game - one of my favourite games. Enjoy!

Beware of the spikes and of the rainbow sphere - it all can kill you.
Could you believe that the end of this game exists?
Controls:

AWD to move; 

P to play;

Esc  to pause; 

R to restart.

If you love this game look my other games on itch.io.

If you are making games or comics join "ByDEN. Game And Comic Jam" that starts soon!!!

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email ( dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
